EmailTemplate.subject: Follow up from MBO Partners (1339442970.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi David, I wanted to follow up from my initial email to see if you were still interested in speaking with me about your experience as an independent consultant. I would like to learn a bit more about you and your business and give you a good understanding of what it is that we do at MBO Partners. If you are interested, please schedule a call using my calendar below: https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK <https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK> Have a great day and I look forward to speaking with you soon! Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <bbentley@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
